channel.title: [Delta]how to set max levels on allstarscape?[Delta]
channel.description:
ok so basically i want the max levels for all stats to be 150 for reg players and mods
for admins and owners I want the max levels to be 777 or 1000 or higher if its poss lmao so basically i need to knw how to change the levels and then set certain levels admins and owners only thanks for any help bye!

item.title: [Delta]how to set max levels on allstarscape?[Delta]
item.dc:creator: @sokuamuag sokuamuag
item.description:
@sokuamuag wrote:

[quote=“x1 att ftw x, post:7, topic:387853”]Givestat will give a player a stat
and setlevel just makes them set their level to what ever they want it to be[/quote]o wow…kool i want that givestat… can u tell me how to do it?

Read full topic
